description: This file implements the DownloadManagerHttpClient class, which provides functionality for downloading files over HTTP using libcurl. It includes methods for initializing, cleaning up, performing downloads with progress and rate limiting, and handling callbacks for progress updates and data writing.

classes.name: DownloadManagerHttpClient
classes.description: A class that manages HTTP downloads using libcurl, supporting features like progress tracking, rate limiting, and thread-safe operation.

methods.name: DownloadManagerHttpClient()
methods.description: Constructor that initializes libcurl and prepares the HTTP client instance.

methods.name: ~DownloadManagerHttpClient()
methods.description: Destructor that cleans up libcurl resources and ensures proper resource release.

methods.name: DownloadManagerHttpClient::Status downloadFile(const std::string & url,const std::string & fileName,uint32_t rateLimit)
methods.description: Performs an HTTP file download to a specified filename with an optional rate limit, handling errors and progress.

methods.name: size_t progressCb(void * ptr,double dltotal,double dlnow,double ultotal,double ulnow)
methods.description: A callback function for libcurl that updates download progress and handles cancellation.

methods.name: size_t write_data(void * ptr,size_t size,size_t nmemb,FILE * stream)
methods.description: A callback function for libcurl that writes received data to a file.

ctags.name: progressCb
ctags.pattern: /^size_t DownloadManagerHttpClient::progressCb(void *ptr, double dltotal, double dlnow, double ult/
